Chuck Schumer Looks to Impose Nationwide Ban Proposed Bill Would Make Ban Synthetic Drugs That Can Create "Legal Highs" 4 comments By BRIAN BRAIKER and KATIE MOISSE These so-called bath salts contain ingredients that are nothing more than legally sanctioned narcotics, and they are being sold cheaply to all comers, with no questions asked, at store counters around the country, Chuck Schumer said in a Feb. 1 statement.
